name: Rosemarie Trockel
alt: a dark-coloured metal staue of an angel with a broken neck and broken wing
caption: Frankfurter Engel
summary: Rosemarie Trockel (born 13 November 1952) is a German artist. She is a professor at the Kunstakademie Düsseldorf, in Düsseldorf in Nordrhein-Westfalen. From about 1985 she made machine-knitted works with geometric or symbolic designs. In 1994 she created the Frankfurter Engel monument for the city of Frankfurt. In 2011 she won the Wolf Prize for painting.
